body_html:
There is no official support for powerPC architecture for TensorFlow.
You will need to check with the community or reach out to stackoverflow for support.

Before I leave, two things that may help:

  • @Nayana-ibm how similar is powerPC to s390x?
  • Boringssl should only be needed for GCS support or a very limited number of kernels. You could try modifying our build files and cut boringssl off and try building again. But no guarantees.
body_text:
There is no official support for powerPC architecture for TensorFlow.
You will need to check with the community or reach out to stackoverflow for support.
Before I leave, two things that may help:

@Nayana-ibm how similar is powerPC to s390x?
Boringssl should only be needed for GCS support or a very limited number of kernels. You could try modifying our build files and cut boringssl off and try building again. But no guarantees.
body:
There is no official support for powerPC architecture for TensorFlow.
You will need to check with the community or reach out to stackoverflow for support.

Before I leave, two things that may help:
- @nayana-ibm how similar is powerPC to s390x?
- Boringssl should only be needed for GCS support or a very limited number of kernels. You could try modifying our build files and cut boringssl off and try building again. But no guarantees.
